meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bushy.
meanings.sent1: The bushiness of the tree made it difficult to see through the branches.
meanings.sent2: Her long hair had a natural bushiness that she loved.
meanings.sent3: The bushiness of the hedge made it a perfect hiding spot for the cat.
meanings.sent4: The bushiness of the forest created a sense of mystery and adventure.
meanings.sent5: The bushiness of the beard gave him a rugged and outdoorsy look.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a thick growth of hair or foliage.
meanings.sent1: The bushiness of the plant made it a favorite among gardeners.
meanings.sent2: The bushiness of her eyebrows added to her expressive face.
meanings.sent3: The bushiness of the wig made her look like a famous singer.
meanings.sent4: The bushiness of the forest canopy provided shade on hot days.
meanings.sent5: The bushiness of the shrubbery created a cozy nook for birds.

meanings.definition: The appearance of being full or dense.
meanings.sent1: The bushiness of the crowd made it hard to find her friend.
meanings.sent2: The bushiness of the clouds signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent3: The bushiness of the cake frosting made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: The bushiness of the fur coat kept her warm in the winter.
meanings.sent5: The bushiness of the bookshelf gave it a cluttered but cozy feel.
